name: Tower Of Frost
description:
A game where you need to reach the top of a ice tower, avoiding monsters and a lot of spikes along the way.

Once you complete the level once you can die and repeat the level in a much difficult difficulty "Hard Mode". This makes the game extremely hard and transforms it into a rage game instantly.

 I Hope you enjoy playing my game! 

Have fun :)

Assets Used:

https://rottingpixels.itch.io/cave-platformer-tileset-16x16free

https://vnitti.itch.io/glacial-mountains-parallax-background 

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-fantasy-knight

https://opengameart.org/content/seamless-cave-in-parts

https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy

https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-character
